TextFile.InputText:
# Advent of Code - Rock, Paper Scissors
In this version, the only rules for the input format are that it contain these 6 sets of data, surrounded by parentheses.
- shape, names, separated, by commas - player, codes, separated, by commas - opponent, codes - shape, scores - wins, againt, player, codes - outcome, scores
Like this: These rules that define the traditiona game with the sames (Rock, Paper, and Scissors).
Each shape has a unique code for the player (X, Y, Z) and opponent (A, B, C) to use. Each shape also has a score (1, 2, 3) and a shape that it wins against (C, A, B). The game also has specific outcomes for win, loss, and draw with scores of (6, 0, and 3) respectively.

Lines.string: # Advent of Code - Rock, Paper Scissors
In this version, the only rules for the input format are that it contain these 6 sets of data, surrounded by parentheses.
Like this: These rules that define the traditiona game with the sames (Rock, Paper, and Scissors).

Each shape has a unique code for the player (X, Y, Z) and opponent (A, B, C) to use. Each shape also has a score (1, 2, 3) and a shape that it wins against (C, A, B). The game also has specific outcomes for win, loss, and draw with scores of (6, 0, and 3) respectively.
